headline: Tapestry (TPR): Revisiting Valuation After a 71% Year‑to‑Date Share Price Surge
summary: Tapestry (TPR) has quietly delivered a strong run over the past year, and with the stock up roughly 71% year to date, investors are starting to revisit what is driving that climb. See our latest analysis for Tapestry. The steady climb has been driven less by flashy headlines and more by a reset in expectations, with a 70.61% year to date share price return and a powerful 5 year total shareholder return of 326.34% suggesting momentum is still very much on Tapestry's side. If Tapestry's surge...
